About jobseeker.com

Here is what the application is all about..

jobseeker.com is an application that employers/companies can use to post available jobs that they might haveto fill. to find

Applicant can use the application to apply to the jobs posted on the site by companies nor view them.

Languages used to build jobseeker.com

Here are all Languages used..

PHP and Javascripts are to used for the backend along with MySql for the database. to find

Html and Css are used to style and implement the webpages.

What jobseeker.com Offers

Here is what jobseeker.com Offers..

People that are looking for jobs can register and apply for jobs available. employers can register and post jobs on the site and have control over their posted jobs. to find

The site has three side: Admin, Employer and Applicant side.
